utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Fellow warriors, this is Sheldor the Conqueror. We are about to enter Axel’s fortress. Now this is a long run, so let’s do another bladder check. Alright Barry, we’ll wait for you again, but you really should see a doctor. Sheldor is AFK. Penny, are you experiencing some sort of difficulty?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yes, I can’t get my stupid door open.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You appear to have put your car key in the door lock, are you aware of that?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Alright then.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit, dammit.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Would it be possible for you to do this a little more quietly?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I can’t get the damned key out.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well that’s not surprising. That Baldwin lock on your door uses traditional edge mounted cylinders, whereas the key for your Volkswagon uses a centre cylinder system.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Thankyou, Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You’re welcome. Point of inquiry, why did you put your car key in the door lock?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Why? I’ll tell you why. Because today I had an audition, it took me two hours to get there, I waited an hour for my turn, and before I could even start they told me I looked too Midwest for the part. Too Midwest? What the hell does that even mean?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, the American Midwest was mostly settled by Scandinavian and Germanic peoples who, well they have a characteristic facial bone structure….

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I know what it means, Sheldon! God, you know, I have been in L.A. for almost two years now, and I haven’t got a single acting job, I have accomplished nothing, haven’t gotten a raise at work, haven’t even had sex in six months, and just now when I was walking up those stairs a fly flew in my mouth and I ate it.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, actually, insects are a dietary staple in many cultures, they’re almost pure protein.

utterance.speaker: Penny (picking up the bag she has just repacked, whereupon the bottom falls out and the groceries fall to the floor again)
utterance.content: Oh, sonofabitch!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I believe the condensation on your frozen foods weakened the structural integrity of the bag. But returning to your key conundrum, perhaps you should call a locksmith and have him open the door for you.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I did, and he said he’ll get here when he gets here.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: And you’re frustrated because he phrased his reply in the form of a meaningless tautology?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No! I am frustrated because I am a failure at everything and my breath smells like fly.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: There there. Would you prefer to wait in our apartment?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No Sheldon, I’d rather sit on this freezing cold floor sobbing like a three year-old.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Alright then.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: For God’s sake!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Just when I think I’ve gotten the hang of sarcasm.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Make yourself comfortable. Not there. Sheldor is back online.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Sheldor?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: The Conqueror.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: AFK. I’m playing Age of Conan, an online multiplayer game set in the universe of Robert E. Howard’s Conan the Barbarian.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Sheldor, back online.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What’s AFK?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: AFK. Away from keyboard.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: OIC.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What does that stand for?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, I see?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yes, but what does it stand for?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Now just click on the enchanted boots to put them on.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, I don’t know. Can I see them in another colour?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Just click on them. Congratulations, you are now a level three warrior.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: What’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Leonard, guess what, I’m a level three warrior.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Great, you know there are groceries outside of your apartment?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah yeah yeah, shhh!

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I only bring it up because your ice-cream is melting and it’s starting to attract wildlife.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Uh-huh, yeah, do I stay in the jungle or go towards the beach?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: It doesn’t matter, right now you’re looking for treasure.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay. Wait, wait, where are you going?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You’re okay, if you run into crocodiles just kick them with your boots.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Want to catch me up?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well let’s see, uh, she attempted to open her apartment with her car key, because her face is overly Midwestern, um, she hasn’t had sex in six months, and she ate a fly.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Seriously, six months?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh my God, a treasure chest, I’m rich!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Level three and she thinks she’s rich! What a noob.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Okay, we’re all set.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Let her rip.

utterance.speaker: Penny (entering, carrying a laptop)
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hey, check it out, it’s just corn starch and water.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: They make up a non-Newtonian fluid which is liquid, but solid under the percussive action of the speaker.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: That’s what makes it get all funky.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, okay. Listen, I need to talk to Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Howard (after Raj whispers in his ear)
utterance.content: No, that’s what she said, Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, look, I bought the game, and I’ve been exploring the Island of Tordage but I can’t figure out how to get past the guard captain.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Do you have the enchanted sword?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, no, I’ve a bronze dagger.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You can’t slay the guard captain with a bronze dagger, my Lord it’s like the car key in your apartment door all over again.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Alright, alright, how do I get the sword?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, have you been to the Temple of Mithra?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Is that the place on the hill with the weird priests in front of it?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No, no, no, it’s… oh for God’s sakes, gimme.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Thank you, I really appreciate this.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You’re going to have to learn to do these things for yourself, Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Don’t patronise me, just get the sword.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: What the frak?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Beats me. They were playing all last night too.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: It’s like some kind of weird comic book crossover.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Like if Hulk were dating Peppermint Patty.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: I always thought Peppermint Patty was a lesbian?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: No, that’s Marcie. Peppermint Patty’s just athletic.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: There you go, one enchanted sword.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Right, gimme, gimme, gimme, I want to kill the guard captain. .

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: That girl needs to get a life.

utterance.speaker: Penny (whispering)
utterance.content: Sheldon. Shel-don.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Danger, danger.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No danger, look, it’s just me, Penny, look, I got to level 25 and reached Purple Lotus Swamp, right?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You’re in my bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah. Leonard gave me an emergency key.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: People can’t be in my bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, well can we go talk in the living room?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I’m not wearing pyjama bottoms.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I spilled grape juice.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Well, wear different pyjamas.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I can’t wear different pyjamas, these are my Monday pyjamas. Penny, people cannot be in my bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, just tell me, is it too soon to join a quest to the Black Castle?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You were invited on a quest to the Black Castle?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, by some guys in Budapest, I’m just not sure it’s the right move for my character.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Of course it’s not, you’re only a level 25, the Hungarians are just using you for dragon fodder.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Really? Boy, you’d think you could trust a horde of Hungarian barbarians.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon (off)
utterance.content: Please Penny, enough, I have to sleep.

utterance.speaker: Penny (off)
utterance.content: Okay, well you were great, thanks. Oh, hey Leonard, listen, don’t got in Sheldon’s room, he’s not wearing bottoms.

utterance.speaker: Leonard (knocking on door)
utterance.content: Sheldon, you want to catch me up again?

utterance.speaker: Gablehauser
utterance.content: People, I am very busy today.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I realise that Dr Gablehauser but it is your job, as head of the department, to mediate all inter-departmental disputes. University policy manual chapter four, subsection two, mediation of inter-departmental disputes.

utterance.speaker: Gablehauser
utterance.content: Fine. Dr Winkle, what colourful name did you call Dr Cooper this time?

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Dr Dumbass.

utterance.speaker: Gablehauser
utterance.content: Dr Cooper, Dr Winkle apologises.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No she doesn’t.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: No I don’t.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Here’s the problem. I was clearly signed up to use the mainframe in Buckman 204, and Dr Winkle just wantonly ripped the sign-up sheet off the wall.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: It wasn’t even an official sign-up sheet. He printed it himself and he put his name down in every slot for the next six months.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: If it is a crime to ensure that the universities resources are not being squandered chasing sub-atomic wild geese then I plead guilty. Oh, Penny!

utterance.speaker: Gablehauser
utterance.content: You need to get that Dr Cooper?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: God, no.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Well don’t turn it off, you might miss your call from the Nobel committee letting you know you’ve been nominated as dumbass laureate of the year.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh yeah, well, you wouldn’t even be nominated. Dr Gablehauser, I have a series of important multi-bit calculations and simulations to run. All she’s doing is reducing irrelevant data and making a mock…

utterance.speaker: Gablehauser (as phone rings)
utterance.content: Excuse me. Gablehauser. It’s for you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Hello. Penny, this is not a good time. No, I told you, you’re not prepared for the Sanctum of Burning Souls. You need to be in a group of at least five for that quest, and one should be a level 35 healer. Penny, I can’t log on and help you. We’ll talk when I get home. I’m not getting the computing time, am I?

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Dumbass.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Leonard, you have to do something about Penny. She is interfering with my sleep, she’s interfering with my work, and if I had another significant aspect of my life, I’m sure she’d be interfering with that too.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Why should I do something, you’re the one who introduced her to online gaming.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, yes, but you’re the one who said hello to her when she moved in. If you’d simply restrained yourself none of this would be happening.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Why don’t you just tell her to leave you alone.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I did. I told her, I texted her, I sent out a very emphatic twitter. I even changed my facebook status to Sheldon Cooper wishes Penny would leave him alone. I don’t know what else to do.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, what am I supposed to do?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I don’t know, but if you don’t figure something out, I warn you I shall become very difficult to live with.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You mean, up until now we’ve been experiencing the happy funtime Sheldon?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: I’ll go talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, Fritz, I need you on my flank. No, I don’t know German. Flankenzie, flankenzie!

utterance.speaker: Leonard (knocking and entering)
utterance.content: Hey Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Busy.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Yeah, I see that. Shouldn’t you be at work?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I don’t work on Mondays.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: It’s Thursday. Listen, Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Uh, Queen Penelope AFK. What?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Okay, um, here’s the thing, um, sometimes people, good people, you know, they start playing these games and they find themselves through no fault of their own, you know, kind of, addicted.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, get to the point, I’m about to level up here.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Well, i-i-i-it’s just if a person doesn’t have a sense of achievement in their real life it’s easy to lose themselves in a virtual world where they get a false sense of accomplishment.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, jabber jabber jabber, okay boys, Queen Penelope’s back online.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Penny, you’ve got cheetos in your hair.

utterance.speaker: Penny (pulling cheeto out of hair)
utterance.content: Oh, thanks.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Wow.

utterance.speaker: Warrior
utterance.content: Hey Penny, it’s me again, Leonard.

utterance.speaker: Penny- warrior
utterance.content: Leonard, I said not now.

utterance.speaker: Leonard-warrior
utterance.content: Yeah, I know, I’m just a little concerned about you.

utterance.speaker: Penny-warrior
utterance.content: I said not now.

utterance.speaker: Leonard-warrior’s head
utterance.content: Okay, maybe later.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: Leonard and Howard
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Raj (indicating Sheldon)
utterance.content: Hey, what’s with him?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Penny’s been keeping him up at night.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Me too. But probably in a different way.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: She’s gotten really hooked on Age of Conan, she’s playing non-stop.

utterance.speaker: Raj
utterance.content: Ah, yes, online gaming addiction. There’s nothing worse than having that multi-player monkey on your back.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Sheldon, wake up.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Danger, danger.

utterance.speaker: Leslie (arriving)
utterance.content: Afternoon men. Sheldon.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh yeah, well your attempt at juvenilizing me by excluding me from the set of adult males…. oh, I’m too tired to do this.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Right, I heard you’ve been pulling all nighters with middle-earth Barbie.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: She comes into my room. No-one’s supposed to be in my room.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Well, I would postulate that she’s escaping into the online world to compensate for her sexual frustration.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I do that too. But probably in a different way.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: That’s not what she’s doing, Leslie, she’s just trying to shore up her self esteem, it has nothing to do with sex.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Everything has to do with sex.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: Mmmm, testify.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: I’m not touching that.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Leslie, you are way off base here.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Hang on, Leonard, while I have no respect for Leslie as a scientist, or a human being for that matter, we have to concede her undeniable expertise in the interrelated fields of promiscuity and general sluttiness.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Thank you. My point is that Tinkerbell just needs to get her some.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Some what? Oh, yes, some sexual intercourse.

utterance.speaker: Howard
utterance.content: I’ll take the bullet.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Excuse me, this whole idea is insane.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, enough debate, I’m going to take action. Excuse me, are you currently involved in a sexual relationship?

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Would you like to be?

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Uh, sure, why not?

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Sheldon…

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Zip it pip it. Can I have your phone number?

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Uh… Yeah, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: There, problem solved.

utterance.speaker: Leslie
utterance.content: Dumbass.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Okay, I’m at the gate to the Treasury of the Ancients, I’m going in.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Stay close to the wall. Avoid the mummies.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Got it.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I must say, you’re playing very well for a woman of 23?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, here come the mummies, which spell do I use? The hateful strike, or the frenzy stance?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: What happened to the rest of your group?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: I dumped them, they’re a bunch of wussies.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Frenzy stance.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Frenzy, frenzy, frenzy, frenzy, frenzy!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: So listen, would you describe your ideal vacation as a wild adventure to unknown lands, or staying at home curled up with a good book?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: These are market research questions. I’m filling out the online registration for your game.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh, okay, wild adventure. Oh, frenzy stance isn’t working, die you undead mummy, die!

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Drink a healing potion.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: You’re welcome. Anyhow, on a scale of 1 to 5, with 1 being always initiated by him, and 5 being always initiated by you, how do you prefer your sexual encounters to begin?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: That’s on the registration?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh yes, it’s quite extensive. But if we complete it, we get a free expansion pack, 75 additional quests.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Ooh, awesome, okay, I totally like to initiate I’m a big old five.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Good to know. Big old five.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Man
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Leonard, this is Tom.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Hi Tom. Sheldon? Didn’t I explain to you about your little mistake in the cafeteria?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Yes, you were very clear, as was everyone else at the table. Tom, however, has been chosen by science as a suitable mate for Penny.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Chosen by science?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Well, what passes for science on dating sites. They claim to use heuristic algorithms, but it may well be hokum.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: You got Penny to sign up for online dating?

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: No, of course not. No, I used trickery and deceit.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: This is bad.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Tom is a paramedic with the fire department, but he’s going to med school at night, uh, he likes the outdoors, and, uh, strong women who initiate sex.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: Really, really bad.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: I’m surprised you struck out with Penny. Apparently she’s a big old five.

utterance.speaker: Penny (entering, looking ratty in baggy clothes and with her hair unwashed)
utterance.content: Sheldon, what do you want.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Oh, good, you got my note. Penny, I’d like you to meet Tom, uh, Penny, this is Tom, Tom, may I present Penny.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Hi Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Yeah, Hi, listen, as long as I’m here, I’m on a quest with a bunch of noobs, they don’t know what they’re doing, we’ve got one assassin, three spellcasters and no tank.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: Can we talk about this later.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: No, no, no, no, I need you now.

utterance.speaker: Sheldon
utterance.content: But wouldn’t you prefer to socialise with Tom, who is a sexually passive outdoorsman.

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Whatever, I’ll figure it out myself.

utterance.speaker: Tom
utterance.content: Bye, Penny. I’m sorry, dude, she didn’t look anything like her picture.

utterance.speaker: Leonard
utterance.content: They never do.

utterance.speaker: Warrior
utterance.content: Hello, fair Penny.

utterance.speaker: Penny-warrior
utterance.content: Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Warrior
utterance.content: It is I, Sir Howard of Wolowitz. Can I interest you in an afternoon of spirited questing, followed by a flagon of ale at yon virtual tavern?

utterance.speaker: Penny-warrior
utterance.content: Yeah, sure, why not?

utterance.speaker: Penny
utterance.content: Oh my God, I need help.
